q: Mr Eric Schmidt had been brought in to provide greater management experience to Google. He has been in the job for a decade and will become executive chairman. Google said Mr Eric Schmidt would focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . The BBC reports the announcement was made as Google unveiled strong net profits in the last three months of$ US2.54 billion on revenues of$ US8.44 billion. The$ US2.54

will now be in charge of day-to-day operations at Google, and discussed how he's studied closely under Eric Schmidt for the last ten years.`` I believe Larry is ready,'' Eric Schmidt told investors. It's time for him to have a shot at running[ Google]. The two were careful to frame the move as a positive transition. Eric Schmidt will be`` elevated'' to his new position, it was explained.`` How can we run the company even better?

executive chairman, Eric Schmidt revealed in a post today on Google's blog. More businessperfectly,'' Eric Schmidt said.`` As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier. If cities are moving projects forward quickly`` that's Jerry Brown 's fault'' said Rosemead Councilwoman Maggie Clark . The governor is being very shortsighted in taking this position, because it can be an economic stimulus, Maggie Clark said.`` In the long run, it could have disastrous effects for us.'' Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
